name: The Inkwell
description: A lovely piece of work that I recovered from a bin of waste pottery at my old high school. Dimensions are approximately 2.5" x 3.0" x 3.0". The mouth has approximate 1" diameter. Thick ceramic shell with lovely black glaze makes a nice touch. Ink marker / quill pen not included (haha). Hand Deliver-> Wilmington only.

name: Deciduous Forest Needs Ultrastrength Rogaine at Night
description:
8.5" x 10" x 0.5" ceramic panel. Rounded top provides an archway effect. Rescued from a junk bin! Detailed 3d leaves with texture. Zoomed view of the night sky seen through an opening in an autumnized tree. Beautiful colors, popcorn effect on leaves, and raised 3d trees.

Hand Deliver-> Wilmington only.

name: Lidded Mortar seeks Pestle
description: Another ceramics-waste rescue. Wheel-spun body is unpainted. Thick structure, very heavy. Lid is handmade and gracefully irregular. Lid handle is handmade as well. Very attractive design, very minimal. 3.5" diameter, 4.0" tall. Hand Deliver-> Wilmington only.

name: Presushi
description:
A certain red fish made into a fantastic pinata complete with fu-manchu made of pipe cleaners. 

Open-end pinata, not fillable. 

Please don't break me! :(

Hand Deliver -> Wilmington only.
